name: Fireside Inn & Suites Portland

reviews.title: Great Place!!
reviews.text: The Holiday Inn West is a great place for kids and adults alike! They just renovated and it looks fabulous! The service was great, can't wait to go back!

We were lucky enough to get a room at the Holiday Inn, when all flights in the NE were delayed due to summer storms. We took the hotel shuttle in both directions and were pleased with the accommodations. We did have a drink in the bar as they offered an excellent jazz ensemble for evening entertainment. Dinner in their restaurant was very good. It was a clean hotel and worked well for our situation.
reviews.title: Good choice

reviews.text: The staff at this hotel were very friendly and always ready to give us advice on places to go, also the pool was great for the kids. On the down-side the room was dirty and musty, when we first arrived the bed sheets had not been changed from the previous guests. The Kids enjoyed their stay here.
reviews.title: could do better

reviews.text: This is a pretty nice place conveniently located off I-95 and close to the attractions of Portland and other nearby areas. Freeport, home of L.L. Bean is 20 minutes away.
reviews.title: Very Nice and Even the Food Was Good.
Do drop Inn
reviews.text: The hotel is very modern and clean. Our room was very comfortable and it looked as though it was remodeled fairly recently. The bed was very comfortable and the room features its own heating and air conditioning system. The bathroom was a bit small but we managed.

The staff here was very friendly. The night manager was very good about pointing out shore sights to see and gave me great driving directions. There are two pools with one of them indoors. The indoor pool is small and shallow but it’s a good place for small children. The outdoor pool was bigger but not quite large enough to handle all of the people that went in since it was hot outside.
reviews.title: Great value and location

reviews.text: We got this room for $75 the night we statyed there. The hotel was great! Clean rooms and friendly service. The kids and I had a great time at the indoor pool for a before bed swim.
reviews.title: Great value, Would stay again

aka: Fireside Inn & Suites Portland Hotel Portland
description: We offer today’s features with yesterday’s charm. Just minutes from the Portland Jetport and situated directly off I-95 Exit 48, our travel-friendly location is easily accessible. With its comfortable rooms, courtyard views and hospitality, the Fireside Inn & Suites Portland is the ideal choice for you and your family while visiting the Greater Portland Area.While staying with us, we invite you to enjoy Zackery’s Fireside Restaurant for dinner and evening entertainment. Our menus appeal to a wide set of tastes and we are extremely proud of our Staff. Please browse them at your leisure. We serve breakfast, dinner and wonderful desserts! We also have a full bar in Zack’s Club Lounge and offer drink specials for Happy Hour. We are pretty creative with martinis too! Whether you are joining us for business or pleasure, we are waiting for you! While you are here, why not relax by our Lobby Fireplace. Enjoy our late afternoon complimentary fresh coffee right here! Stay with us and each guest will receive a FREE Isamax Snacks Wicked Whoopie Pie! The Whoopie Pie is Maine’s Official State Treat (officially becoming law on September 28, 2011)!
